title: Get your email PW within Thunderbird
content: Is there a way to get your email password within Thunderbird? I'm trying to add TB to a new computer but it is not taking the password that I thought I was using.
creator: JudsonMcCranie

title: Cannot send email on Thunderbird, but only receive.
content: Long time user, but suddenly I cannot send email on Thunderbird. I receive message: "ELNK003. Error code 308. Verify email address in Account Settings". All appears OK to me, but I cannot send , but only receive. Thanks, Michael Opitz [edited] @mindspring.com Cell: [edited phone# from community support forum]
creator: mopitz

title: Transferring Address book  from my PC to a laptop
content: Good Morning, I donate to Thunderbird on a regular basis. I have had bought for me a new Lenovo Laptop. I have managed to install Thundebird OK but my address book has not moved over to my Laptop. Why has this not happened & could be so kind as to instruct me on how to resolve it. Iam 86 & registered as disabled & my Computer skills are a little limited. I have tried to import the addres book but have not succeeded. Regards Peter Alexander Carr 0744 393 5419
creator: assheton63
